oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Possibilities to improve yield of green manured spring barley crop by delayed sowing in organic production
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Väisänen, Jaana
Forsman, Kristian
Kakriainen-Rouhiainen, Sanna
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Cereals, pulses and oilseeds
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: During 2000-2002 field trials were carried out at two locations (Juva and Ruukki) to investigate the effect of delayed sowing on green manured barley crop.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: Väisänen, Jaana; Forsman, Kristian and Kakriainen-Rouhiainen, Sanna (2003) Possibilities to improve yield of green manured spring barley crop by delayed sowing in organic production. Paper at: Nordic agriculture in global perspective: NJF's 22nd congress, Turku, Finland, July 1-4, 2003.
